content: In this challenge, you are required to construct a tragic tale consisting of a hero, a curse, a forest, a treasure, and a prophecy in two sentences. However, apart from the constraint that each word can only be used once, you must also include a twist in the story that involves the use of magic. Your story should have a logical explanation for how all of these elements fit together. Best of luck!

In the heart of the enchanted forest, a valiant hero named Arin discovered a cursed treasure that promised unimaginable wealth but also foretold a prophecy of doom. With a single touch, the magic within the treasure unraveled, revealing that Arin himself was the ancient sorcerer who had cast the curse centuries ago, trapping his own spirit in an endless cycle of greed and tragedy.
